message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40.
You could have had more, now it's my turn to propose
Let's try to be reasonable.  We both lose money with each round, so let's split it evenly.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
We're both losing money here. Let's split the difference and find a compromise. I'll take 40, and you can have 60.
You're getting close to nothing, I'm getting close to everything
This is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to take less than a third to avoid getting nothing at all. Let's split it 30/70.
